original: ERLANDSSON, Thorsten Eugen, Civilingenjör, Närkes Kvarntorp, f Hyllie, Malmöh l, 22/12 00 av byggn.ing E E o Ida Thunberg, gm Margit Söderqvist. Ex tekn elem.sk i Malmö 20, lab.ing v Kockums Mek Verkst AB i Malmö 20—21, arb.led v Elektr AB Non Vibra där 22—23, prakt v kommunalt elverk o elektr fmor 23—25, maskinkonstr v ASEA 25—27, stud v KTH (E) 27—31, l :e assist å lab f elektr anläggn.tekn v KTH 31—36, driftsing v Hellefors Bruks AB :s elektr avd 36—42, nu chef f elektromek avd v Sv Skifferolje AB, Närk Kvarntorp. Biträtt prof Sten Velander v utredn- o planeringsarbeten.
translated: ERLANDSSON, Thorsten Eugen, Civil Engineer, Närkes Kvarntorp, born in Hyllie, Malmö l, December 22, 1900, son of building engineer E. E. and Ida Thunberg, married to Margit Söderqvist. Formerly a technical elementary school student in Malmö in 1920, laboratory engineer at Kockums Mek Verkst AB in Malmö from 1920 to 1921, working leader at Elektr AB Non Vibra from 1922 to 1923, apprentice at municipal power plant and electrical company from 1923 to 1925, machine design at ASEA from 1925 to 1927, studied at KTH (Royal Institute of Technology) from 1927 to 1931, first assistant at the laboratory for electrical installation technology at KTH from 1931 to 1936, operating engineer at Hellefors Bruks AB's electrical department from 1936 to 1942, currently chief of the electromechanical department at Swedish Shale Oil AB, Närkes Kvarntorp. Assisted Professor Sten Velander in investigative and planning work.

structured.name: Thorsten Eugen Erlandsson

work.name: Municipal Power Plant and Electrical Company
Swedish Shale Oil AB, Närkes Kvarntorp

structured.description: Formerly a technical elementary school student, Thorsten Eugen Erlandsson is a Swedish civil engineer currently serving as the chief of the electromechanical department at Swedish Shale Oil AB. He was born on December 22, 1900, in Hyllie, Malmö l. His parents are E. E. Erlandsson, a building engineer, and Ida Thunberg. Thorsten is married to Margit Söderqvist. He studied at the Royal Institute of Technology (KTH) and has worked in various organizations, including Kockums Mek Verkst AB, Elektr AB Non Vibra, Municipal Power Plant and Electrical Company, ASEA, and Hellefors Bruks AB's electrical department.

career.workplace: Municipal power plant and electrical company
Swedish Shale Oil AB, Närkes Kvarntorp
